content.prompt: The complex designs that make up this work reflect its function as a

choices.label: sacred icon that was used in private worship by early Christians
divider intended to mark the transition between different sections of a book
instructional tool intended to illustrate the content of sacred stories for illiterate people
status symbol that represented the wealth and high social standing of its owner

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.4: Purpose and Audience in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
